extendedInfo.description: "These 'Speak' Apps are way faster & more useful than my expensive Rosetta Stone Software"  - Comment by Android User who downloaded 12 Holfeld Language Apps+++ Get your personal Speak-App-Collection NOW  Search for 'holfeld' and find all the languages you are interested in +++SPEAK RUSSIAN: Hear&Learn the language of RUSSIA ! ESSENTIAL phrases for your trips to MOSCOW or ST. PETERSBURG. QUICK and USEFUL! Most Apps or classes try to teach you 1000s of words you will never need. This App gives you all the phrases you will very likely need! SAVE TIME & MONEY by hearing & learning essential phrases like Hello, How Are you, Thanks, Goodbye and many more. If you are good in the basics, you can use the advanced categories business, travel or relationships.Very EASY to use!Essential phrases! Clear audio recordings! The EASIEST way EVER!If you are interested into the Russian culture or you want to visit Moscow or St. Petersburgh, this iPhone App is perfect for you!Features:+ Clear lively audio recordings of native Russian girl+ Very easy to use!+ 3 Categories with essential basic phrases:+ Basics, Relationships, Leisure+ More Categories in the Full Version "Speak Russian""This App is FUN and USEFUL at the same time"The iPhone App "Speak Russian" has all the essential phrases recorded for you. Accessible with just one button click. ANYTIME! ANYWHERE!This App is available also with phrases in Chinese, French, Italian, Spanish, Chinese, German, Japanese and more Languages! Just search for HOLFELD in the Android Market!

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Amazing love it!!! I am learning really fast it has great audio to hear pronunciation!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great first step to Russian
reviews.comment: This app is an extremely good easy formatted learning tool that really helped me take my first steps into learning Russian. I insist for someone taking there fist step to learning this languag to download this FREE app. But the full version for free would be nice too haha
reviews.author: D Man

reviews.title: Good if you have an interest in beginning
reviews.comment: For the person who wants to brush up on their beginner course from college, or impress a friend with a phrase or two, go with this. It has great sound, well done.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: !Always wanted to learn!
reviews.comment: This app is great! ,but i wish the free app on how to speak russian had more to offer though........ :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'d be way better if it was free for everything, needs more words, an option for a guys voice, and more categories. Still great though!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It has a fine interface and good pronunciation, but some of the word choices they use in Russian are poor. Not recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice, has the basics and speaks it to you. :-)
reviews.comment: Very basic, but if your self learning it,s enough o get started and expand.
reviews.author: Lyndal Spirit

reviews.title: Great useful app
reviews.comment: This is a convenient little app that really made my first couple of weeks living in Ukraine easier!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good, but a few errors - \"I want to eat something\" is correct with the voice, but the Cyrillic is totally wrong. Great overall though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost useless
reviews.comment: How can you use a phrase if you are not prepared for the answers
reviews.author: Liam Mullins

reviews.title: Best App
reviews.comment: This is the best learning russian app for me but they should put more words to put the last star but for now 4 stars are good!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dangerous
reviews.comment: Extremely limited vocabulary, and many of the words are in their \"familure\" forms witch could make you come off as rude.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Speak Russian Free
reviews.comment: Very basic vocab as simple single words & short phrases but clear & easy-to-use!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good.
reviews.comment: I lobe it.. I can learn how to write it And also how to pronounce.. Wish they would more For free.  :(
reviews.author: Alba Suazo

reviews.title: Great Guise
reviews.comment: Very usefull guide for basic words. However, adding more words and phrases in every section it\'s recommended, specially in the Number section.
reviews.author: Jordan K

reviews.comment: Good start... Its a noce decent trial app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: pretty good
reviews.comment: for a freebie, it gives some general information.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very limited
reviews.comment: 39 common words or phrases plus some numbers. This app is useless to learn to speak russian. You could not carry on even the most basic conversation with the words they give you. Google translate is about 1000 * better
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wrong pronunciations. Take caution
reviews.comment: Some phrases are pronounced wrong. The woman on audio doesn\'t know Russian well. I\'m a native speaker. Stear clear of this irresponsible and  uneducated developer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Quite good
reviews.comment: It was better than I thought
reviews.author: Ania Budewicz
